DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate whether there is a polarity-specific influence of tDCS on cerebral vasomotor reactivity monitored by transcranial doppler sonography.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of tDCS on Cerebral Autoregulation
DOC.criteria: 1. severe cerebral Microangiopathy 2. NOTCH3 carrier 3. Migraine with aura (IHS Classification ICHDII) 4. Stenosis >80%, ECSTCriteria seizure disorder history of severe alcohol or drug abuse, psychiatric illness like severe depression, poor motivational capacity dementia (1+2) history of stroke in past 3 months (3) migraine prophylaxis (4) contralateral stenosis >50%,
